players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Charlie: "Bob seems suspicious to me, I don't know why but something about his behavior last night made me uneasy."
Bob: "Charlie, I think you're just trying to distract us from Alice's suspicious behavior last night. We should focus on investigating them."
Charlie: "I don't think that's fair, Bob. I'm just trying to share my honest thoughts about what happened last night."
